Module FYPManager
Package controllers

Interface ICoordProjectManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
CoordProjectManager
public interface ICoordProjectManager
This interface is used to manage the projects from a course coordinator's perspective.

  • Method Summary

  • Method Details

    • allocateProject

      void allocateProject(Student student, Project p)
      This method is used to allocate a project to a student.
      Parameters:
      student - The student to whom the project is to be allocated.
      p - The project to be allocated.

    • deregisterProject

      void deregisterProject(Student student, Project p)
      This method is used to deregister a project from a student.
      Parameters:
      student - The student from whom the project is to be deregistered.
      p - The project to be deregistered.

    • transferProject

      void transferProject(Faculty current, String replacementID, String replacementName, Project p)
      This method is used to transfer a project from a faculty to another faculty.
      Parameters:
      current - The faculty from whom the project is to be transferred.
      replacementID - The ID of the faculty to whom the project is to be transferred.
      replacementName - The name of the faculty to whom the project is to be transferred.
      p - The project to be transferred.

    • addProject

      void addProject(Faculty user, String title)
      This method is used to add a project to the system.
      Parameters:
      user - The faculty who is adding the project.
      title - The title of the project.

    • viewOwnProjects

      void viewOwnProjects(Faculty user)
      This method is used to view the projects that a faculty member owns.
      Parameters:
      user - The faculty member whose projects are to be viewed.

    • viewActiveProjects

      void viewActiveProjects(Faculty user)
      This method is used to view the active projects in the system.
      Parameters:
      user - The faculty member who is viewing the active projects.

    • getProjectByID

      Project getProjectByID(Integer projectID)
      This method is to get the project by its ID.
      Parameters:
      projectID - The ID of the project to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      The project with the given ID.

    • saveChanges

      void saveChanges()
      This method is used to save all the changes made

    • changeTitle

      void changeTitle(Project p, String t)
      This method is used to change the title of a project.
      Parameters:
      p - The project whose title is to be changed.
      t - The new title of the project.

    • getAllAvailableProjects

      ArrayList<Project> getAllAvailableProjects()
      This method is used to get all the projects in the system.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of all the projects in the system.

    • getAllUnavailableProjects

      ArrayList<Project> getAllUnavailableProjects()
      This method is used to get all the projects that are unavailable.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of all the projects that are unavailable.

      This method is used to get all the projects that are reserved.
      Returns:
